gw.api.util

Class PropertyDisplay

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.util.PropertyDisplay

  • public class PropertyDisplay
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for displaying entity properties in the UI. It will automatically reference the display key for the entity property using the following convention: 
     displaykey.entity.<entity_name>.<property_name>
    If a display key is not found with the given path, the getLabel() will simply return the name of the property itself. Normally display keys should be defined for all properties that may be displayed, the name of the property is not usually a good UI label.
    Author:
    bspies
